1635320.name: 捉迷藏 Hide and Seek
1635320.description:
Introduction

This is a plot-oriented 2D scrolling horror game, the protagonist will follow the plot development through the red and white worlds to solve the mystery and find the exit. What we want to present is not just a simple gore, but a sad story. We hope that you can follow the protagonist to the end of the story and understand the truth of all this.

Game features

・Fridge-horror plot
・2D hand-drawn style
・Diversified puzzles
・Immersive music effects
1635320.supported_languages:
英语*, 繁体中文*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
